content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. I am glad you are interested in my apartment. I am always open to negotiations. Please make an offer for the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I would like to offer a rental price of 500 euros per month for the apartment. I am willing to sign a two-year contract.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I decline your offer. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. I hereby revise my offer. I am willing to pay 550 euros per month for the apartment. I believe this is a fair price for the location and condition of the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I decline your offer. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am sorry to hear that. Here is my next offer: 600 euros per month for the apartment. I hope this price is satisfactory for you.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I decline your offer. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your request. Here is my final offer: 650 euros per month for the apartment. I believe this is a reasonable price for the apartment, and I hope we can reach an agreement.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month! Let's make it a two-year contract. Is there anything else we should discuss?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you. Let's just confirm the start date of the lease. I am flexible. Please let me know when you would like to move in.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: The start date of the lease will be on the 1st of next month. I hope this is convenient for you.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: The 1st of next month is fine for me. Let's just make sure to put everything in writing. I will prepare the lease agreement and send it to you for your review. Once you sign and return the agreement, we will be good to go.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds great. I am looking forward to working with you, Mr. Wang. I will prepare the lease agreement and send it to you. Once you sign and return the agreement, we will be good to go. Is there anything else we should discuss?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: No, there is nothing else to discuss. I will prepare the lease agreement and send it to you. Once you sign and return the agreement, we will be good to go. Thank you for your business.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: You are welcome, Mr. Wang. I will prepare the lease agreement and send it to you. Once you sign and return the agreement, we will be good to go. Is there anything else you need?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: No, there is nothing else I need. I look forward to receiving the lease agreement. Thank you for your time. Have a great day.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Wang. I will prepare the lease agreement and send it to you. Once you sign and return the agreement, we will be good to go. If there are no other concerns, we can terminate the negotiation.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
